How I Can Help Consulting & Services

  • YouTube & Podcast Strategy

    From content ideas and channel optimization to show structure and growth tactics.

  • Blog Building & Writing

    Develop your blog's voice, plan content, optimize for readers, and integrate it with your other platforms.

  • Video Editing Workflow

    Streamline your editing process to save time and improve quality.

  • Audience Growth & SEO

    Implement practical tactics to get your content discovered and engage viewers/readers.

  • Monetization Strategy

    Explore ways to make your content sustainable and profitable across platforms.

  • Content Systems Consulting

    Build efficient workflows for planning, creation (video, audio, written), and distribution.

Frequently Asked Questions

What exactly do you offer? +

I offer 1-on-1 digital consulting sessions focused on strategy, workflow optimization, and practical advice for your content (YouTube, podcasts, blogs, written content, etc.). I also offer website design services. I don't create content *for* you, but I guide you on how to improve yours.

What are your rates? +

Consulting packages are tailored to your needs. We'll discuss pricing and options during the Discovery Call to find the best fit for your budget and goals. You can also see standard rates for affordable consulting and website design on the Pricing page.

What kind of results can I expect? +

Results depend on your commitment and implementation. My goal is to provide you with clear, actionable strategies to improve your content quality, grow your audience, and streamline your processes. I focus on sustainable growth, not overnight miracles.

Do you work with beginners? +

Absolutely! Whether you're just starting out or looking to level up an established channel, podcast, or blog, I can help tailor a strategy for your specific stage.
